messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Mibu gishi den
messages.msgSnippet: Its up on Streamload. Phil, was it you I was supposed to make my files available to? ... From: spiritus saitou To: shq@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, August 16,
messages.messageBody:
Its up on Streamload. Phil, was it you I was supposed to make my files available to?




----- Original Message -----
From: spiritus saitou
To: shq@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 16, 2004 8:56 AM
Subject: [SHQ] Mibu gishi den


Where would someone who wants to see "Mibu gishi den" find a copy of it? (this is not a list member, but someone from the general public.) Is it available only in Japan and without any kind of subtitling? If they decided to buy it from Japan anyway, any better place than through Amazon Japan? Has someone managed to subtitle copies of it (like we have of other samurai films) and made it available somewhere on CD/DVD or streamload?

phil

messages.subject: Re: Mibu gishi den
messages.msgSnippet: ebay + Eng. subs...some ebay copies work better with computers, or work better on regular dvd players try www.nippon-export.com My Japanese version came with
messages.messageBody:
ebay + Eng. subs...some ebay copies work better with computers, or
work better on regular dvd players
try www.nippon-export.com
My Japanese version came with an un-subbed 2nd disk with behind the
scenes stuff...VERY expensive 0_0

messages.messageBody:
Where would someone who wants to see "Mibu gishi den" find a copy of it? (this is not a list member, but someone from the general public.) Is it available only in Japan and without any kind of subtitling? If they decided to buy it from Japan anyway, any better place than through Amazon Japan? Has someone managed to subtitle copies of it (like we have of other samurai films) and made it available somewhere on CD/DVD or streamload?

phil
